Package org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.time

Interface Summary
AdvanceableTime Defines a method for advancing simulation time.
GridTime GridTime provides other classes with an abstract idea of time, sometimes called Simulation Time.
 

Class Summary
EventDrivenGridTime EventDrivenGridTime uses a TimeAdvancer to control the value of simulation time.
GridTimeFactory Factory class for producing the right kind of GridTime object - SimpleGridTime or EventDrivenGridTime, which hops to the next event if all threads are inactive.
SimpleGridTime In SimpleGridTime simulation time is the same as real time.
TimeAdvancer TimeAdvancer controls the advance of time in the event driven time model.
WaitObject When using EventDrivenGridTime, WaitObjects are used to keep track of waiting threads.
